009package Ch15_Color_Filters;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
015import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.LabColorSpace;
018import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.LinearRgb65ColorSpace;
019import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.LuvColorSpace;
020import imagingbook.common.filter.generic.GenericFilter;
021import imagingbook.common.filter.linear.GaussianFilterSeparable;
022import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
023import imagingbook.common.image.ColorPack;
024import imagingbook.core.plugin.JavaDocHelp;
025import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
026
027import java.awt.color.ColorSpace;
028
029import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
030
031/**
032 * <p>
033 * This plugin performs a Gaussian filter in a user-selectable color space. The default test image (opened automatically
034 * if no other image is open) makes the differences noticeable. See Ch. 15 (Fig. 15.6) of [1] for details. This plugin
035 * also demonstrates the use of {@link ColorPack}, {@link GenericFilter} and {@link GaussianFilterSeparable} (using a
036 * x/y-separable 2D kernel).
037 * </p>
038 * <p>
039 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
040 * (2022).
041 * </p>
042 *
043 * @author WB
044 * @version 2022/12/10
045 * @see ColorPack
046 * @see GenericFilter
047 * @see GaussianFilterSeparable
048 */
049public class Gaussian_Filter_RGB implements PlugInFilter, JavaDocHelp {
050
051        private enum ColorStackType {
052                Lab, Luv, LinearRGB, sRGB;
053        }
054
055        private static double Sigma = 3.0;
056        private static int Iterations = 1;
057        private static ColorStackType CsType = ColorStackType.Lab;
058
059        private ImagePlus imp = null;
060
061        /**
062         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
063         */
064        public Gaussian_Filter_RGB() {
065                if (noCurrentImage()) {
066                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.ColorTest3);
067                }
068        }
069
070        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
071                this.imp = imp;
072                return DOES_RGB + NO_CHANGES;
073        }
074
075        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
076                if (!runDialog())
077                        return;
078
079                ColorPack colStack = new ColorPack((ColorProcessor) ip);
080                ColorSpace cs = null;
081                switch (CsType) {
082                        case Lab :              cs = LabColorSpace.getInstance(); break;
083                        case Luv:               cs = LuvColorSpace.getInstance(); break;
084                        case LinearRGB: cs = LinearRgb65ColorSpace.getInstance(); break;
085                        case sRGB:              cs = null; break;
086                }
087
088                if (cs != null) {
089                        colStack.convertFromSrgbTo(cs);
090                }
091
092                FloatProcessor[] processors = colStack.getProcessors();
093                GenericFilter filter = new GaussianFilterSeparable(Sigma); // non-separable: GaussianFilter(sigma)
094
095                for (int k = 0; k < Iterations; k++) {
096                        for (FloatProcessor fp : processors) {
097                                filter.applyTo(fp);
098                        }
099                }
100                if (!colStack.getColorspace().isCS_sRGB()) {
101                        colStack.convertToSrgb();    // convert back to sRGB
102                }
103                ColorProcessor cp = colStack.toColorProcessor();
104                String title = imp.getShortTitle() + "-filtered-" + CsType.name();
105                ImagePlus result = new ImagePlus(title, cp);
106                result.show();
107
108        }
109
110        boolean runDialog() {
111                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
112                gd.addEnumChoice("Color space", CsType);
113                gd.addNumericField("sigma", Sigma, 1);
114                gd.addNumericField("iterations", Iterations, 0);
115
116                gd.showDialog();
117                if(gd.wasCanceled())
118                        return false;
119
120                CsType = gd.getNextEnumChoice(ColorStackType.class);
121                Sigma = gd.getNextNumber();
122                Iterations = (int)gd.getNextNumber();
123                if (Iterations < 1) Iterations = 1;
124                return true;
125        }
126}
127
